summary: The diff implements nearly all required features across backend and frontend. All 9 requirements are substantially addressed. Minor gaps exist around the 'getPost' function visibility in the backend summary, the constraint against altering existing data models (Lead/Service CRUD are now stubbed/broken in useQueries.ts), and a few AC details.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend actor must expose 'getPost' function as part of REQ-1 CRUD operations
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows createPost, getAllPosts, updatePost, deletePost in the backend but getPost is not confirmed visible in the truncated backend/main.mo diff. The file summary does not explicitly mention getPost being exposed as a public query function.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not alter existing data models (Lead, Service) or their CRUD functions â€” constraint violation
missing_requirements.reason: The useQueries.ts file stubs out all Lead and Service CRUD hooks to throw errors, and LeadsPage/ServiceManagementPage/ServicesCatalogPage import Lead/Service types from useQueries rather than backend. The existing CRUD functions appear to be broken/removed from the backend rather than preserved. The constraint explicitly states 'Do not alter existing data models (Lead, Service) or their CRUD functions'.

missing_requirements.requirement: REQ-3 AC: Empty days show a clickable '+' to create a new post for that date
missing_requirements.reason: The ContentCalendarPage.tsx is truncated so we can only see openCreate function defined but cannot confirm that every empty day cell renders a clickable '+' button. The truncation prevents full verification.

hallucinated_features.description: ExternalToolsPage includes 8 tool cards (Zapier, Make, n8n, Buffer, Hootsuite, Later, Pabbly Connect, Sprout Social) instead of the required 6
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 specifies exactly 6 tools. The implementation adds 2 extra unrequested tools: Pabbly Connect and Sprout Social.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration.mo module was added with a full state migration function
hallucinated_features.reason: No migration module was requested in any requirement. The build request only asked for new stable maps isolated from existing ones, not a formal migration system.

hallucinated_features.description: frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts was added as a new file with URL parameter utility functions
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asked for URL parameter parsing utilities. This appears to be a utility file added beyond the scope of the requirements.
